website_summaries.verdict: A powerful yet lightweight option that offers the choice of using steam or ironing dry.
pros: Water reservoir is easy to fill and steam function works as intended
Lightweight and easy to maneuver thanks to 360-degree swivel cord
Adjustable temp and overheat protection mechanism
cons: Not dual-voltage, and it's a little larger than most travel-sized irons

customer_reviews.title: Used Broken Iron
customer_reviews.text: One star because package was delivered fast.. my iron appeared to have been used there was water droplets in the iron reservoir, the iron did not work or turn on. I believe I received someone else's broken return item
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I'm a happy quilter
customer_reviews.text: I like the iron, it's new, but I'm a quilter and use it constantly. It heats quickly and steams beautifully. I prefer a flat sole plate for applying fusibles, but this will work. The size is good, slightly smaller than standard, and very light, so easy on the wrists. The water cavity isn't large, which helps on the weight, and I keep a container handy to top up when it goes dry. I'm ordering another for a friend who is learning to quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Crap. It lasted 1 month and 3 days just ...
customer_reviews.text: Crap. It lasted 1 month and 3 days just after 2-3 uses and just outside the return window. Waste your money on something of a little better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maccaroo

customer_reviews.title: Forget steam, garbage instructions
customer_reviews.text: An OK iron, but forget about using the steam function...the water just leaks out of the holes in the sole plate. The instructions that came with it are pure garbage, it appears that the instructions were made for a different model. There are references to control setting icons that do not appear on ANY of the controls on the iron, so it is not possible to know how to set it for steam or dry function. I made it work dry by dumping all of the water out of it...no water, no steam.
customer_reviews.author: SanLeandroGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great little iron!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little iron. Gets nice and hot. Light weight. Great steam. I use it mostly for quilting so need it hot and with lots of steam. Very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sooty

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this iron
customer_reviews.text: The cord mounting is positioned in the way of your hand on the grip. Very pleased with this iron.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Soules

customer_reviews.title: My last iron was like using a brick
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, heats quickly and surprise, nothing sticks at all. Shipping was very quick and here in 2 days, which is a plus. My last iron was like using a brick, this one performs well, easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! No driving and very Handy
customer_reviews.text: Very light, heats up quickly, no leaks, and the controls work. Also, came quickly and cost less than the iron sold at the store. with the iron I was able to put on a heat-glue patch to a huge hole on my favorite blue jeans. Because it was my favorite, I couldn't bear to throw it away. Plus, they don't make them like that anymore. So the iron saved my pants!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Went for first use, it leaked all over my shirt. Thought it was a good price, wish I would’ve spent more money for an iron that actually works...
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Poor iron
customer_reviews.text: I replaced this iron that was lost in a move. Unfortunately, this iron is not good. It leaks and doesnt keep it warm. I am very disappointed with this iron
customer_reviews.author: ILA PANDEGIROT

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought this iron I just needed something simple as I don’t iron a lot but this is perfect I like the steam option and it heat up really fast. So if you are looking for something that does not cost a lot but performs well this will certainly meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kepley

customer_reviews.title: Price/item as advertised 100%
customer_reviews.text: Very small. For small or quick jobs. It’s not for ironing the 15 items you’ve been stashing to iron later. It’s a one or two item quick iron and travels very well. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 1 month old and the iron is always leaking water ! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Great iron!
customer_reviews.text: This iron was easy to use. Not as small as I thought it would be which was great! Perfect size for me. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good iron
customer_reviews.text: At first I bought it because of its price and it would have seemed fine to me, when the iron arrived he had a small problem and the seller sent me an exchange instead quickly and efficiently .. So already it encouraged me on the reliability of the seller and in fact this iron has been with me for almost two months and it is just wonderful. It is strong and high quality and good. Recommend to anyone looking for or similar irons.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: I got this one because its steam and light weight., My use is a bit different as I'm taking up tiles from the floor and needed a steam iron to lossen the glue. This works just fine for that and make the job a heck of a lot faster. Don't know how it is on clothes but for something different, it work just fine on old floor tiles. Ah, you can't go back and use it on your clothes :( Have to get two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small iron
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small iron to use in our closet. I was tired of going down stairs to press things at the last minute. Thought I wouldn't like it, but do. Don't think it would be good for heavy ironing, but for a touch up is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kl Polovina

customer_reviews.title: Great steam, no water leakage, no burn marks
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this iron is the "steam"! I love an iron that has great steam, for the best wrinkle free garments. It goes around buttons, great. Doesn't give no burn starch marks, and no water leakage, when pouring water in, nor when ironing. It's not small enough to travel on the plane. But you don't want to leave home without it! It's better than alot of irons I have used, and the cord doesn't kink up.
customer_reviews.author: ShesRoyal524

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Steam
customer_reviews.text: Heats up really quickly. The indicator that you line up the temperature dial with is at the BOTTOM- at six o’clock. Once I figured that out, the iron worked really well. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Travel iron
customer_reviews.text: I attended a quilters retreat this past weekend. This iron was quick to heat up, gave a puff of steam that was effective and functioned beautifully. I wish it came with a travel bag, but for the price, it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Travel iron plus.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Heats up quickly. Very lightweight to the point of needing to pay attention until you get used to the unusual weight of an iron as to not have it fall. Easy to fill and empty. Irons beautifully. I use it mostly for my sewing iron. Great for getting the small plate into small areas.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year and then good to throw!
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor quality product. It is literally a use-and-throw brand. It catches on to cloth fibres pretty easily after a few months and starts transferring to other clothes. Also, the water spray functionality broke within 6 months. I havent seen a poorer brand of electric iron in years.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really figured it out on the steam method - seems like it does not steam but I do not iron that much. The directions are not very clear on how it works and believe me - I am a reader of directions. I upgraded from the less expensive $10 version from Walmart - wished I hadn't but I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Holman

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Comes up to temperature quickly and is very light weight. Smaller surface area than I am used to but I'll take the light weight option over that. My only complaints are the cord appears substantially shorter than my old iron which kind of gets annoying when trying to maneuver the iron over a shirt. The big one for me which prevented 5 stars is the iron appears to not be as hot as I am used to . It certainly does the job but even the highest temp setting seems a bit off ..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a standard size iron
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a travel iron that would not be heavy and easily fit in my luggage for travel. This iron appears to be almost the size of a standard iron. The product description calls this a travel iron. Cannot speak to the iron's performance as I never used it. If you are looking for small this is not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Justmia

customer_reviews.title: Bought this iron for light ironing on small items and it is perfect for this.
customer_reviews.text: This iron is lightweight and easy for people with arthritis or other issues; carpel tunnel, tendinitis. It is easy to hold and simple to operate. The cord is not retractable and that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use flat iron
customer_reviews.text: A gift for a family member with neuropathy. Perfect weight and comfortable handling ...she has been very pleased with ease in ironing as needed
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q Tx.

customer_reviews.title: Good iron, that’s about it
customer_reviews.text: They say the better investment you put into a house hold item, the better it is. But not for this bad boy, it’s cheap and is worth the money. But I had to minus one star though. I’ll tell you why, it’s because I accidentally burned myself on this iron. It says it turns off automatically, but it takes awhile to turn off itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Light weight iron
customer_reviews.text: I love this iron for my use. I use it in my sewing room ... it is light and dies a great job for pressing quilt pieces etc.
customer_reviews.author: vinella

customer_reviews.title: Leaks within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I am a quilter and this iron was used a lot but it started leaking within 5 months of purchase. My last iron was a low cost iron and it lasted 4 years with almost daily use. I am going back to the old brand of iron that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Grace2882

customer_reviews.title: Decent Iron
customer_reviews.text: Very small; much smaller than I had expected. Overall takes a while to heat up, but once it does fairly easy to use. The surface area is quite small, so I would not recommend for anyone who is ironing on a very frequent basis. However, great product for those one-offs.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I wish it has an OFF option
customer_reviews.text: It's an iron. We use it for arts and crafts projects and its perfect. It does it's job. I just wish there's an OFF switch/option. You have to unplug it to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl De Guzman

customer_reviews.title: LIghtweight
customer_reviews.text: I really love using this as it heats rapidly and is so lightweight. I have been busy making masks for family and friends and this iron is perfect for ironing my fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hager

customer_reviews.title: Not travel sized
customer_reviews.text: This is not small enough to take on a trip - so if you're getting it for that reason, it's a bad choice. That said, it works well (steams great) and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Aminesteytz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my moms caregivers to use. They loved it and says it was easy to use, has a cup with it to help refill the water, and it worked well. I’m happy that for a small amount of money I could help out the system at Mom’s house !
customer_reviews.author: TheMom50

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Iron...6 months and done.
customer_reviews.text: I love how light weight this iron is but it only lasts about 6 months and then quits. The company sent me a replacement about 6 months after the first was purchased and that one died today. It's too bad they dont last because I really like the iron.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie & Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so easy to use Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The unboxing was very simple and if new like it said on the listing temp control awesome I’ve used it on everything I wear including my wife so easy to use and just glides on
customer_reviews.author: David Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I do really really like it but find I keep catching the back end ( I'm not sure even if that's the way to explain it) but maybe if the sole plate was a little bit longer. But don't get me wrong I use all the time and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: SandyP

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and heats up quick! Does the job. Good for anyone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jeevanthi

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. I've used it a few times and have been quite please. It was smaller than expected but the quality of it makes the difference. I've only had it for about month. So let's see how it holds up after I've used it for a few more months upwards to a year.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Moton

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast, I have not added water, presses seams nicely and is what I expected. It’s unbelievably light, I would almost prefer more weight to it. The plastic doesn’t scream durability, but at this price it should hold up
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: but I guess fine for the low price
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly effective, but I guess fine for the low price. Works in a pinch, or if you rarely have to iron.
customer_reviews.author: Marie_dva

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this iron for removing the wax out of our chairs after a candlelight vigil at our church and it works great every time. I don’t have any complaints about it I recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: AtheyMts

customer_reviews.title: This is a lightweight iron but does a fine job of steaming
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight iron but does a fine job of steaming. As you noted, it's important to read the instructions for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This iron is JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Iron arrived in used condition and I am applying for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't heat up
customer_reviews.text: This iron wouldn't stay on long enough to get hot. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: L. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Awkward dial
customer_reviews.text: This iron is extremely awkward to use. The dial to turn it on and adjust settings is at such an inconvenient location. It's also difficult to see what setting it is set on because it's blocked by the handle. I couldn't tell if it was on or off. This iron just didn't work well for my intended purpose and will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Scstumpf

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron after mine stopped working. I mostly use it to iron fabric so I wanted a lighter one that was easy to handle. I really like this iron. It is light and easy to use and does what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: KCJ55

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  This is not the iron you want.  Move along
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered in early June. Only 77 days later and the plate is ice cold. The iron is dead. The window for returning it is past. we bought an iron and now own a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schleicher

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's a great basic iron I haven't used it for clothes yet but I've used it for crafts and it does the job. Very lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a first iron
customer_reviews.text: I threw out the instructions for this product, so I decided to self-teach myself how to use it. It's definitely not self-explanatory. Take my advice, keep & read the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ellen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it leaks and did the first time i used it. was not expensive tho" works well as dry irn
customer_reviews.author: gayle rush-lopez

customer_reviews.title: It is light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I intended for this to be a travel & crafting iron. I will never use the steam function, so I cannot speak to that feature. The iron does heat quickly and reaches consistent temperatures. It is light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Used once, then it refused to heat.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product once, then put it away because I don't iron often. Pulled it out to use a second time, and it refused to heat up. It's past my 30 days to return it via Amazon, so I'll just have to toss it. Won't be ordering this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's an iron
customer_reviews.text: works well, have owned now for quite some time, probably a year or so, and works as it's supposed to. I must mention that i only iron when sewing, so can't speak to its daily use.
customer_reviews.author: TomOrAshley

customer_reviews.title: WOW THIS IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Light, Sleek, works better than my $89.00 iron. Screw the expensive on, this little blue one I bought is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: RJ Smith - The Real RJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money!!!! This iron never gets hot enough to remove wrinkles. Cheap quality and randomly turns off. One light does not work always so you can’t tell if it’s on and hot. Very dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold for arthritis sufferers
customer_reviews.text: The iron arrived early, thank you Amazon, and is exactly as described. It works well for my craft projects making masks for myself and my family with hem tape (I tried hand stitching, not a fan!). I’ve made about a dozen masks in a few days. The handle is easy to hold and it’s light weight making it easy for my arthritic hands to hold. The price was right and I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cox

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great iron. Very light weight and has good steam feature. I use it mostly for ironing fabric for a quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Reser

customer_reviews.title: No good product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2 Nd one of these I have bought, the first one worked for about one month and then the water would just pour out of the steam holes. Then the 2 Nd one I have had a month and it won’t heat up at all. Cheap price but very cheap product ! Would never buy again!!!! Pretty sad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie phearson

customer_reviews.title: Better than home iron.
customer_reviews.text: People I love,love this iron even more then my regular Iron that I use. Don’t hesitate to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wahlen

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Create Reliable Steam
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic iron that is ok if you only use it dry and for basic ironing needs. The steam function is useless. It does not steam the water properly, no matter how long it's given to heat. It makes a small amount of steam, but the water that doesn't turn to steam dribbles out the plate and leaves tiny puddles of water on the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Iron
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today in the mail. I haven’t used it yet but it’s very light, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. A fine iron for the money, so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for steaming hats and use only distilled water. So far it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kamoooosh

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month
customer_reviews.text: I had this iron for less than a month. It worked well with steam until today ( five days shy of a month of use). Today it will not heat and shows no sign it is on. I have switched places where I plug in but it still will not work.
customer_reviews.author: A Great Grandmother from Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: I like it for shop work
customer_reviews.text: bought to do edge banding in shop and it does great. plenty of watts for fast heat. Small size is great for shop and I don't ruin my clothes iron
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: First use, it immediately stuck to my fabric and transferred fabric residue. Not smooth. Retuned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JFozz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality! It works as an iron and does the job. Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Phoua

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: Great little iron, works like a charm. Use it for travel. Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Koppenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Generic
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge but light. No power switch. Pretty generic!! But I guess it does get hot. Blaah
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mcgill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect iron for crafting
customer_reviews.text: Got this for sewing fabric and it’s perfect. Just big enough and lightweight. Works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This iron stopped working completely after only four months of use.
customer_reviews.author: MelG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and heats up fast . Great iron ,excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Anne Manera

customer_reviews.title: not best
customer_reviews.text: I regret to buy this. It is not too hot enough to iron the good fabrics. works on silk, not really on cotton. you have to hold against clothes hard and longer. It is just weak.
customer_reviews.author: chelz

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a rental. Haven’t used it myself but haven’t had any complaints either.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy posey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this iron!
customer_reviews.text: This iron is horrible! It doesn't work, get hot and it spits water and it's done this since day one. I bought it because it was supposed to be a solid inexpensive iron. It's not! You get what you pay for and I paid for garbage filler.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Jordon

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my wife (for whom I bought the iron) didn't like it, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: musiklover

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality iron.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iron in March 2019. I only use it when piecing quilt blocks/tops. It doesn’t heat well and in less than six months of use it does not heat at all. Additional sole plate wrinkles up fabric. Would not recommend this iron to anyone for any purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Finney

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this light weight iron . Does it all and won’t break the bank .
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S Leichner

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to carry for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great iron lightweight irons close easy to carry long cord love it
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very hot and keeps having to reheat
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this iron for my button down shirts but it was ineffective. It's also pretty small and therefore takes a long time to cover your whole shirt. Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy This Iron
customer_reviews.text: Iron doesn’t heat up - just dribbles water. Worse purchase I’ve ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: iron
customer_reviews.text: boufht this for my grandma and she absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help with some sewing projects. Works perfect so far, heats and cools easily. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Used !
customer_reviews.text: Item had hair in it and was used ! Disappointed was looking forward to using it .
customer_reviews.author: Tete

customer_reviews.title: The iron itself
customer_reviews.text: This iron is like a toy. It doesn’t work well with cotton fabric. The steam is ok. But I’m disappointed with this. And the box was ripped when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: rose canillo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working outside of return policy. Is there a manufacturer’s warranty? If so I would like to fulfill it. Otherwise I’d give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for doing crafts & some sewing. Definitely recommended it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Musumeci

customer_reviews.title: Great iron small flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Great all around iron. The only thing I didnt like was the tank was small and I had to refill it after every 2 articles of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Good Iron
customer_reviews.text: Do sewing for charities and needed lots of steam and one that stays on. This iron fits the bill and economical too. I'm happy .
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight iron
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this inexpensive iron because my expensive Shark would not get wrinkles out, This iron does the trick. It is lightweight, steams well and gets the wrinkles out with the first try instead of ironing 3x with my Shark.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nestor

customer_reviews.title: Easy Ironing
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once...nice crisp ironing. Comes with a nice plastic cup to fill for steam. Lightweight, easy to manuever. So far, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G

customer_reviews.title: I got a used iron for a new iron
customer_reviews.text: What i disliked about this product...it first appeared to be used as there was droplets of water in the iron...the lid on the box it came in was partially opened and when ironing it was leaking....not happy with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Heats quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to do a quick iron before work. Takes less than 30 seconds to fully heat. Steam works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc G

customer_reviews.title: Pay more
customer_reviews.text: This item continues to turn off as if the plug is defective
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use it at home, travel and works perfectly. The best little iron.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do, great for price!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafts
customer_reviews.text: This works fine with clothes but it’s main use is for pearler beads and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Price says it all.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks. Doesn't steam well. Either very cool or burning hot. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and then just stopped working. I now have to buy a new iron. 😒🙄
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Benzinger

product_meta.title: Utopia Home Steam Iron with Nonstick Soleplate - Small Size Lightweight - Best for Travel - Powerful Steam Output - 360 Degree Swivel Cord- 200 mm Water Tank - Dry Iron Function 1200 Watt (Blue)
feature_bullets: Lightweight and ideal for travel; steam iron can be used vertically to steam clothes on hanger or to take out wrinkles from curtains and drapes
200 millimeter of water tank makes adequate steam for clothes, drapes, and curtains
Use the steam iron as a dry iron for delicate fabrics without worrying about damaging the fabric
360 degree swivel cord makes it more easier to iron or steam vertically without worrying about the cord tangling
Additional features include an adjustable thermostat control, overheat safety protection, non-stick soleplate, variable steam control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,515 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
